name: RAMM Science
slogan: RAMM Science is an (AI) and Blockchain enterprise software solutions company
description:
Our platforms include:

-  RAMM DL - A Deep Learning Platform
-  Hydra - Smart assets on the blockchain
-  DeepPoint - Spatial Intelligence:  AI meets LiDAR
-  Continuum - High performance numeric/scientific visualisation software

jobs.title: Python Developer
jobs.description:
About Us



RAMM Science is an Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Blockchain enterprise software solutions start-up. We believe in the ethical use of frontier technology to make business more efficient, create new markets, accelerate scientific discovery and help make the world a better place.

With large financial backing and customers across the globe, we are now entering a phase of rapid growth. As part of this growth, we are looking to expand our team with talented people who want to join us on our rocket ship! This is an exciting time to join the company, with a fantastic opportunity for personal and career progression.


The Role



We are looking for a senior developer to work on DeepPoint, our multi-sensory LiDAR and Camera security solution powered by Deep Learning. 


Requirements 

 

Coding:

3+ Years experience with python
High level of experience with numpy
Comfortable with Python2 and Python3 (we are 99% python3)
Experience with django 
Experience with high performance python, distributed computing, IPC, multiprocessing, queues, buffers
Comfortable profiling and debugging deep performance issues
  

Operational:

Excellent knowledge of git
Excellent linux commandline knowledge
Excellent system administration knowledge
Comfortable writing tests and using gitlab and CI system
Comfortable mentoring juniors and helping them grow
 

 Bonus but not essential:

 Experience with Cython and JIT compilation
Experience / Knowledge of C
Experience with Keras and Tensorflow
HTML/CSS/Javascript proficiency

Benefits 


Salary £60,000 - £80,000 (Depending on experience
Office Location – Google Offices, Ropemaker Street
Working hours – 9:00am – 5:00pm
Flexible working = +/- 2hours (i.e. 7:00am – 3:00pm, 11:00am – 7:00pm)
Working from home – Optional every Friday
25 days holiday
An additional day off on your birthday
FREE lunch provided every Monday
Training & Development opportunities
